name: Learning Kotlin Fundamental
description: Teaching myself the fundamentals for Kotlin and how to develop Mobile applications using Kotlin Jetpack Compose so I can create the frontend application for my NFC storage system app

name: NFC Inventory/Storage System
descriptionTitle: Mobile application and REST API server
description: A storage system solution for finding where the storage bin where an item is stored. The idea is to create a Kotlin frontend app that allows you to write and read a NFC sticker tag to create and view a storage bin. With this you can then add items to a specific bin. Allowing a user to search for an item and find the bin number/numbers of where that item is stored. This will be stored in a REST API backend with a relational database
